summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Signal by Profitcast MVP - Login, navigation, and core features tested. Major modules functional with some backend authentication issues.

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 404 'Employee record not found' for admin user
critical_bugs.impact: Attendance and leave management unusable for admin

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 403 'Not authenticated' despite valid JWT token
Returns 403 'Not authenticated' despite valid JWT token

data_issues.impact: Cannot test HRM features (attendance, leave management)

ui_bugs.issue: Check-in button triggers error toast 'Employee record not found'
Issue creation fails with 'Failed to create issue' error

integration_issues.issue: Frontend shows error messages when admin tries to use attendance features

passed_tests: Dashboard loads with stats cards and platform cards
All sidebar navigation pages accessible (Employees, Projects, Tasks, Vault, Attendance, Leaves, Issues, Calendar, Settings)
Dark mode design with proper Signal/Profitcast branding
JWT authentication working for most endpoints
Basic CRUD operations for departments, projects, tasks
PMS services template listing (16 service types available)

success_percentage.frontend: 80% (Login, navigation, vault working - attendance and issues failing)

action_item_for_main_agent: Create employee record for admin user to enable HRM features
Fix authentication issues for /issues and /notifications endpoints - check if routes are properly included
Verify JWT token validation in issue and notification endpoints
Test attendance check-in after employee record is created
Test issue creation functionality after authentication is fixed
